Lyric:
[by:小陀螺Tony]
[ti:Perfect (OutaMatic Remix)]
[ar:OutaMatic Taps One Direction 406072247]

[by:九九Lrc歌词网～www.99Lrc.net]
[00:29.23]I might never be your knight in shining armour
[00:33.88]I might never be the one you take home to mother
[00:37.77]And I might never be the one who brings you flowers
[00:42.09]But I can be the one, be the one tonight
[00:45.42]
[00:46.08]When I first saw you
[00:48.45]From across the room
[00:51.03]I could tell that you were curious
[00:54.01]Oh, yeah
[00:54.98]Girl, I hope you’re sure
[00:57.20]What you're looking for
[00:59.32]'Cause I'm not good at making promises
[01:01.69]
[01:02.60]But if you like causing trouble up in hotel rooms
[01:06.94]And if you like having secret little rendezvous
[01:11.40]If you like to do the things you know that we shouldn’t do
[01:15.55]Then baby, I'm perfect
[01:17.89]Baby, I'm perfect for you
[01:20.09]And if you like midnight driving with the windows down
[01:24.23]And if you like going places we can’t even pronounce
[01:28.68]If you like to do whatever you've been dreaming about
[01:32.97]Then baby, I'm perfect
[01:35.30]Baby, I'm perfect
[01:37.02]So let's start right now
[01:38.69]
